snippet.title: The Dark Phantom Dawn Of Darkness - Reminds me of the original Max Pain - Trailer
snippet.description:
The Dark Phantom is an video game, Powered by UDK. It's the Story of a super hero who's in search of his past and become the criminal's worst nightmare. Let me know what you guys think of this early look at an up coming Indy title. 

This one really reminded me of Max Pain. I love the style. Currently trying to get green lighted on steam! Help them out here on the steam page.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=152623386

Or check them out on ModDB. 
http://www.moddb.com/games/the-dark-phantom-dawn-of-darkness
